${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Whip.NAME: Whip
${modID}:Whip.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Take !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ReactiveStrike.NAME: Reactive Strike
${modID}:ReactiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Damage value rerolled from 5 to 15 when you take damage.

${modID}:Dynamic.NAME: Dynamic
${modID}:Dynamic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, enemy loses equal HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Dynamic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, enemy loses equal HP.

${modID}:Bloodbath.NAME: Bloodbath
${modID}:Bloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:selfvulnerable! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Bleed to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Debauchery.NAME: Debauchery
${modID}:Debauchery.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to EVERYONE. NL Gain !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to EVERYONE. NL Lose !M! HP.

${modID}:FinalForm.NAME: Final Form
${modID}:FinalForm.DESCRIPTION: Set HP to 1. NL Gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Sadism.NAME: Sadism
${modID}:Sadism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! HP.

${modID}:Infection.NAME: Infection
${modID}:Infection.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

${modID}:Bloom.NAME: Bloom
${modID}:Bloom.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Gain !M! Regen.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Poison.

${modID}:MassDestruction.NAME: Mass Destruction
${modID}:MassDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to your HP.

${modID}:ToxicRecoil.NAME: Toxic Recoil
${modID}:ToxicRecoil.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! Poison back.

${modID}:Osmosis.NAME: Osmosis
${modID}:Osmosis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block. NL Convert your current Block to ${modID}:Temporary_HP.

${modID}:Laceration.NAME: Laceration
${modID}:Laceration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Bleed.

${modID}:Polymorphism.NAME: Polymorphism
${modID}:Polymorphism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you change ${modID}:Forms, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Aftercare.NAME: Aftercare
${modID}:Aftercare.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:TenTickles.NAME: Ten Tickles
${modID}:TenTickles.DESCRIPTION: Add *Whips into your hand until it is full.

${modID}:JokesOnYou.NAME: Joke's On You
${modID}:JokesOnYou.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage until next turn, gain !M! HP.

${modID}:UnceasingBottom.NAME: Unceasing Bottom
${modID}:UnceasingBottom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:UnceasingBottom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Scarhide.NAME: Scarhide
${modID}:Scarhide.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to missing HP.

${modID}:Bloat.NAME: Bloat
${modID}:Bloat.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If in ${modID}:Molt_Form, gain !B! Block again.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !B! Block. NL If in ${modID}:Molt_Form, lose !B! Block again.

${modID}:Nibble.NAME: Nibble
${modID}:Nibble.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Raise your Max HP by !${modID}:nibblegain!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Mitosis.NAME: Mitosis
${modID}:Mitosis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your HP. NL Double your Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Edgelord.NAME: Edgelord
${modID}:Edgelord.DESCRIPTION: If in ${modID}:Moribund_Form, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Proboscis.NAME: Proboscis
${modID}:Proboscis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this enemy loses HP, gain !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Exhibitionist.NAME: Exhibitionist
${modID}:Exhibitionist.DESCRIPTION: Lose ALL Block. NL Remove ALL Block from the enemy.

${modID}:Gobble.NAME: Gobble
${modID}:Gobble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain ${modID}:Temporary_HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:PowerBottom.NAME: Power Bottom
${modID}:PowerBottom.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double the number of cards in your discard pile.
${modID}:PowerBottom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Deal damage equal to double the number of cards in your discard pile.

${modID}:Wrigglewall.NAME: Wrigglewall
${modID}:Wrigglewall.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Malleable does not reset at the start of your turn. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Vitality

${modID}:Amalgamate.NAME: Amalgamate
${modID}:Amalgamate.DESCRIPTION: Raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RunicTriangle.NAME: Runic Triangle
${modID}:RunicTriangle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.
${modID}:RunicTriangle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you lose HP, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:CoilLash.NAME: Coil Lash
${modID}:CoilLash.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change ${modID}:Forms, add !M! *Whip{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s} into your hand.

${modID}:Rot.NAME: Rot
${modID}:Rot.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you gain HP with this card in hand, gain !M! more.

${modID}:SecondSkin.NAME: Second Skin
${modID}:SecondSkin.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you gain Block with this card in hand, gain !M! more.

${modID}:Cocoon.NAME: Cocoon
${modID}:Cocoon.DESCRIPTION: When you end your turn in ${modID}:Molt_Form, Retain your hand.
